entities.name: medieval times
entities.description: The time period being referred to in the text.

entities.name: magic
entities.description: A supernatural power or phenomenon that is feared by people in medieval times.

entities.name: witch
entities.description: A person who practices magic and is often associated with evil deeds.

entities.name: wizard
entities.description: A person who practices magic and is often associated with good deeds.

relationships.description: People in medieval times were afraid of magic.
Witches and wizards are opposite types of people who practice magic.
